title: (4960) Melgaco - 4960 Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Nice and calm place in the sportsfield area, lots of green areas nearby, very calm for the night.

title: (4960) Melgaço -
description: Nice place to stay, very calme at night. Nearly you have a soccer field, tennis court and ping-pong tables and Wc's with free access during the day.

title: (4960) Melgaço - Unnamed Road
description: Nice picnic area near Melgaço

title: (4960-507) Melgaço - 28 Rua de São Tiago
description: Market Park, free. Very good to visit the village of Melgaço. In front of the castle. Forbidden on market days Very flat pitches

title: (4960) Melgaço - Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Quiet place to park and sleep. You can also park in the market parking, except market days (fifth feira)

title: (4960) Melgaço - 300 Avenida Salgueiro Maia
description: Borne euro-relais.

title: (36430) A Estación - 20 Rúa da Estación
description: I have parked one night in the shade under a tree. It was nice and flat. There is water to drink and you can bathe in the river. It is a very nice place for one night.

title: (36430) Arbo - PO-400
description: Night area with drinking water, black water and waste water. Near the bridge to cross for Portugal.

title: (4960) Crastos - EM1144
description: Picnic with a few tables, churrasquera and fuente, Paderne. There is room for about 4 cars.

title: (36437) O Vieiro - 1 Lugar Iglesia
description: Church car park and, going up 200 meters further, the town square and a picnic area. Very good views. Quiet. The entrance from the main road is steep and narrow. Refrain beginners or explore earlier.

title: (36437) Arbo - 13 Lugar Lomba
description: Nice quiet picnic spot to stop to eat and rest. clean shading with a fountain and garbage cans. It is next to the road but little traffic.

name: Pazo Pondal
title: (36436) Pazo Pondal
description: Wine cellar with agriculture (13 ha). Production of Albariño wines 100/100.

title: (36436) A Lavandeira - 24 Lugar Iglesia
description: Public parking next to the restaurant. Well paved and level. Quiet. The church bell gives something the can to mark hours.

title: (36428) Crecente - Unnamed Road
description: Broken cruiser. It is a small hermitage with a picnic area shaded by oak trees. There is a fount. Pass the prg174 route that if you follow it, you will see beautiful views of the Miño river and visit another 12th century hermitage "A virxen do camiño". The site is very quiet. It does not usually have people even during the day. It is flat. I have not slept because I have a house nearby. In the town (Crecente) there is a swimming pool. also Mandelos beach, on the Ribadil river. In the same river there are some waterfalls "or well of inferno" with walkways. nearby is "a torre de Fornelos", medieval, in ruins.

title: (4960) Cousso -
description: Flat area with beautiful views. Two picnic tables. Space for 4 vehicles. Very calm.

title: (32236) Padrenda - 13 OR-412
description: Parking. Shaded tables and a barbecue. Children's area. 100 m. from the swamp dam. We spent the night here, very comfortable and quiet. Pretty flat.

title: (36887) - 1 Lugar Peña Francia
description: Church with little traffic, ideal for sleeping and has a small fountain with water

title: (32236) Lordelo -
description: Simple but very beautiful Mirador. with the possibility of indoor bbq. I recommend keeping to the left when you reach the top of the mirador. space for 2/3 campers.

title: (4960) Lamas de Mouro - N202
description:
Water point. 
Seems fresh and clear.
Local people come to fill bottles.

title: (36880) A Cañiza - 19 Lugar Villanueva
description: Parking in service area of ​​Quintana (A Cañiza). Ideal to park and go to the town center to taste the ham, typical of there.In 10 minutes you can walk.

title: (36880) A Cañiza - 29 EP-5005
description: Parking in wide street to visit A ​​Cañiza, Villa del Jamón.Suele to have room to park without problem.Gas station at 50 meters, and center A Cañiza 500 meters. Many bars and restaurants to taste the ham.

title: (36880) A Cañiza - 12 Rúa Campo da Feira
title_short: (36880) A Cañiza - 12 Rúa Campo da Feira
description: Level parking in a garden area at the entrance of Cañiza. At 800 meters there is a Repsol service station where gray can be emptied. There are several play areas, tables and barbecues. The town is just 1 minute away where there is everything (Bars, restaurants, health center, laundry, pharmacies...)

title: (36880) A Cañiza - 30 Rúa Vilanova
description: Parking area where you can eat and take a break. Grass floor with a small stream.

title: (36880) A Cañiza - 7A Rúa Regueiro
description: Free Parking of the Concello

title: (36446) As Neves - 24 Lugar Chandevide
description: Picnic area under the shade of Carballos, with a play area, barbecue, the possibility of sleeping and a bar nearby. Very calm

title: (36447) Sancharredonda - Unnamed Road
description: Asphalt and earth esplanade next to a hermitage with a small cemetery and accompanied by some picnic tables. There are shadows and it's quiet. We have not spent the night we have only stopped to eat.

title: (36880) A Cañiza - 25 Estrada Logroño-Vigo
description: Own laundry

name: Camping Cañiza
title: (36888) Camping Cañiza
description: Camping Caniza

title: (4960) - Unnamed Road
description: Great place for parking during the day or night (vigilance during all night) at the entrance of National Park Gerês. Toilets and water very close by.

name: Camping de Lamas de Mouro
title: (4960) Camping de Lamas de Mouro
description: Camping Lamas de Mouro. Clean and quiet in the heart of the Peneda Gêres National Park. At 900 meters above sea level and full of activities to do on site.

title: () Pontedeva - Carretera Trado-Armean
description: Large brand new free area, all services free, barbecue, picnic tables, beautiful panorama, but no shade. In addition, prohibitions of all kinds: no wedges, no blinds, no table, no armchair, etc...

title: (4960) Lamas de Mouro - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet location, near a hiking departure, little see not at all busy out of season. no problem to access it by vehicle. another spot at 30m possible near the departure information center rando. very nice walk along the GR50. a corner not to miss seen the little spot in this region!

title: (36491) Crecente - PO-400
description: Very quiet parking to rest. Well located to visit the hot springs of Prexigueiro.Source with drinking water.

title: (36490) Crecente - PO-406
description: Miradoiro Alto Guillade. Parking area for 2-3 motorhomes.

title: (36448) As Neves - Unnamed Road
description: Awesome location above the clouds, quiet and amazing view.

title: (32200) Cortegada - 22 Rúa Baño do Monte
description: Fantastic place to spend the night close to the Spa-Spa of Cortegada, 100 meters away. Park adjacent to the pool, with public barbecues and public and free hot springs. Drinkable water in public fountain.

title: (32200) Cortegada - 20 Rúa Otero Novas
description: Parking located at the foot of the river Miño, right next to the old spa of Cortegada, idyllic setting.Cafetería -terraza in the spa.There are a couple of hairpin bends but it passes well, it is worth it for the beauty of the place.

title: (36440) As Neves - 12 Estrada Circunvalación
description: Good and bright place to park and spend the night. The road is on the side, but cars hardly pass at night. There is a school next door .. Very quiet place.

title: (36440) As Neves - 8 Praza San Agustín
description: Night and area services. Drinking water and gray and black water drain free. 50 meters from the city center. Calm.

title: (4950) - EM1120
description:
Nice place with a lot of space
next to the beach Praia do Sr do Rio 
cold shower, piknik tables and barbecues.
great calm place for people with childrens

title: (36490) Varóns -
description: Quiet place next to the river, with two esplanades to park

title: (36448) Nieves - Unnamed Road
description: Easily accessible by road for 90% of the journey, the end requires a little more commitment (easy in a short 4x4 van and cc 4x4) not possible in a cc non 4x4 in my opinion of course! We are in cc 4x4 of 7m. Not a sound not a waste and no one on weekdays!!! The Chapel is closed

title: (4960) Castro Laboreiro -
description: Beautiful spot with accesible way, ok even for bigger vans and autocaravans. Place for two cars, maybe more. Surrounded by beautiful nature and silence. Just sometimes cross some hikers because it is start of many hiking trails. Best place in village for those who looking for quit place in nature. Take your rubbish out!!

title: (36448) As Neves - Unnamed Road
description: Along a path, under the poplars with a small spring, start of walks. no passage at night, flat. good narrow climb to access it for 200m.

title: (32235) Pontedeva - 17 Lugar Xinzo
description: Beautiful countryside around the town chapel. There are tables and beautiful views. At 5 minutes, below the town, there is a route along the bank of the river Deva.

title: (4960) Castro Laboreiro - EM1160
description:
Parking of the cementery, only for small vehicles. Please leave enough space for the locals to visit the cementery and don't leave rubbish.

the parking is a bit uneven. Views are nice and it's a godlod starting point for walks.

title: (4960) - N202-3
description: Fantastic village of Castro Laboreiro in Gerês National Park. Nice and quiet parking space for motorhomes up to 7.50 meters long. Monuments to visit, great restaurants with typical gastronomy and beautiful landscapes. Toilets at the bottom of the stairs, towards the viewpoint, on the right.

title: (4960) - 104 EM1159
description: Peaceful place in the middle of the Portuguese countryside with a clear view of the mountains and the valley, ideal for a stopover for lunch (bins nearby)

title: (36872) Covelo - 25 Estrada Maceira
description: Thanks to the town of Covelo for this facility, an area well located for mountain biking trails, near the river beach of Maceira. Village with a lot of life and municipal swimming pools.

title: (4950-096) - EM1112-2
description: Lovelylittle restaurante by the road nice service good food

title: (4960) Senhora da Guia -
description: The access track is a little rough but ok for our 6m AC. 200m from the road at the top of the hill there is a lovely level area. Some shade is possible. Very clean. A few farmers drove past but no problems. Just us and the cows. Quiet, peaceful night.

title: (4970) - Unnamed Road
description: Just off the road and onto a huge flat boulder. Incredible views and solitude. Only suitable for van, not camping car. No facilities. Take your rubbish with you, don't let me regret sharing this awesome spot!

title: (4950) Monção - 152 EN202
description: drinking water fountain. Water is controlled and suitable for consumption. Access and exit excellent. No faucet or thread. Therefore only with bucket and watering can.

title: (4950) Monção - 178 Rua do Rio Minho
description: Quiet place near the river where there is a path that goes through orchards

title: (36873) Covelo - 13B Lugar Castro
description: Very quiet place to spend the night and watch the stars on clear nights, with benches in the chapel and a fort right next to it.Ideal place to take a walk along the forest track that climbs towards the mountain, with wonderful views time up high.

title: (4970) Arcos de Valdevez - Unnamed Road
description: Parking in a quiet, relatively flat, a small km from the village center. Good alternative to that of the center. Empty out of season even during the day (May). Surely no longer used during the day in high season when the village is full. Perfect for sleeping, no ban. Departure of hike. Sorry no pictures. On your right when you go down towards the village. There is a similar one 100m further.

title: (4960) - Unnamed Road
description: Idyllic spot on the edge of the track accessible by van or small camper. opportunity to go to the end of the trail to find picnic tables and shade next to a small church. the track is a little busy until sunset. after that you will only have to appreciate the milky way.

title: (4960) Parada do Monte -
description: Attention: the access path is only for van with higher clearance and best to have capable tires. For a 4x4 this is easy. Even after days of rain the path is still good. The location is at a beautiful lake and a good spot to do some hikes or mountain bike. In summer people come here to let their dogs take a swim.

title: (4970) - Unnamed Road
description: Accessible parking area a little higher than the road. No shade. Mountain view. Just above the village. Very good for one night. Possible for any size.

title: (32410) Melón - 2 Camiño dos Fundios
description: Parking in front of the Melon monastery

title: (4970) Sao Bento - Parking au dessus de la route, São Bento do Cando
title_short: (4970) Sao Bento - Parking au dessus de la route, São Bento do Cando
description: Nice flat area near a kind of view point/cross monument. A village overlooking the place but still fairly private. Incredible view. Cold in the mountains from September. A Hiking trail is also near this spot

address.street: Parking au dessus de la route, São Bento do Cando

title: (32211) Gomesende - 3 Lugar O Val
description: Nice place next to the Sanctuary of Our Lady of the Valley through which the route of the Arnoia river passes pr-g143, I am going to take it as a starting point arriving by a track to escudeiros and start the route from there, accessible for motorhomes of 7.5m.

title: (4970-150) Gavieira - 233 En 202
description: A nice place behind the church with a beautiful view of the valley. It can be busy during the day but wonderfully quiet at night. Nowhere is it indicated that you are not allowed to park here at night and in the low season (April) there was no check. A few level pitches on top, many more on a slope. Toilet building next to the church, however, it seemed that it was not cleaned. Perfect starting point for beautiful hikes.

title: (4970-150) - 215 En 202
description:
Official parking for the monastery of Peneda. Great place to visit, also many hiking trails depart here. Water, toilets, cafe and a restaurant can be found here. Not recommended for overnight-it is in a village also there are loud bells of the church next to it. 
Drive from the northern side of the village.

title: (4960) Castro Laboreiro - Unnamed Road
description: Fantastic place to spend the night. Rough track but we took it slowly in our 6m AC and it was fine. Large parking area, sloping, more parking in the trees. Old chapel (closed), spring water, shade, BBQs and picnic tables. Saw no one else.

title: (32710) Ribadavia -
description: Termas de prexigueiro, on the river, quiet place

title: (32410) Melón - Carretera Logroño-Vigo
description: Recreation area with swimming pools for swimming and a path where you can enjoy beautiful waterfalls

title: (32418) - 105 Lugar Prexigueiro
description: Parking near the hot springs of Prexigueiro. The hot spring car park closes when they are closed. The car park that is referenced now is right next to the path that goes down into the free zone to bathe with thermal water. On the side of the road, you can park about three vehicles.

title: (36873) Covelo - PO-255
description: Two wooden tables with panoramic views

title: (32417) A Arnoia - Unnamed Road
description:
This car park is located in a dead end, at the end of a path where there is a cemetery.
There is a garbage can outside the cemetery.
Quiet place in the middle of erasure.
Nearby there are the natural terma of Prexigueuro

Camiño do cementerio, Prexigueiro, 32410 Ribadavia, Province of Ourense, Spain

title: (4950) Monção - 10 Avenida das Caldas
description: Parking of the public garden. Playground for the little ones. Advised by the tourist office. River at 50m. Shady. We are Monday and everything is calm. Opportunity to have water from the caretaker at the pool.

title: (32418) Prexigueiro - 79 Lugar Prexigueiro
description: drinking fountain. Near spa and pools. You can buy homemade wine in several houses.

title: (4950) Monção - 1 N202
description: Car park

title: (4960) Castro Laboreiro -
description: Decent size flat parking area. Start of some hiking trails. No problems overnight.

title: (4950) Monção - 8 EM1097-1
description: Huge parking lot, no prohibition signs. Quiet nights! There is a water tap, but without thread. Highly recommended! Please note: every Thursday there is a market in this parking lot. So DO NOT park between Thursday 05:00 am and Thursday 18:00 pm

title: (36457) - 38 Lugar Pedrafurada
description: Parking next to the Hot Water Municipal Baths of Salvaterra de Miño.

title: (4950) Monção - 1 Rua Monsenhor Avelino Gonçalves
description: Ideal for visiting, no service, at the foot of the fortress. Huge semi-shaded car park close to the historic center

title: (32411) - 5 Lugar Cruceiro Gordo
description: Water in service station. Possibility of connecting a hose.

title: (36873) - 2A Lugar Souto
description: Very nice river beach. Nearby, a specific public car park for her, from which it is reached by a very short path with wooden posts. Next to camping

title: (32417) A Arnoia - 7 Lugar Outeiro Cruz
description: Parking area next to the Arnoia river and with stone tables and an old mill. There are no services or water or emptying area. Very nice river walk. It is next to the town.

name: Camping Maceira
title: (36873) Camping Maceira
description:
Camping Maceira. 
Enjoy your holidays with your family and friends in this 1st category mountain campsite located a few meters from the river beach of Maceira, a spectacular natural environment. Admire the banks of the Tea rivers and their tributaries, with their waterfalls and swimming pools, make the wonderful hiking and mountain biking routes suitable for all audiences.

title: (4970) Sistelo - 1997 N304
description: Small picnic area where you can spend the night next to the road. Good views of the valley.

title: (4950-454) Monção - Av Afonso III
description: Ground parking shared with cars. We stayed several times very quiet. two minutes from downtown.

title: (32417) Arnoia - 23 Acceso Vila Termal
description: Hotel Arnoia Spa Parking. At the start there are several sockets where you can plug in the motorhomes. (12 outlets) 8/10 places beware of tree branches that can get in the way

title: (36873) Covelo - PO-255
description: Glade on a forest road with a beautiful view of the surrounding mountains. From the PO-255 southbound on the forest road. In dry weather also suitable for vans.

title: (4970) Gavieira - Unnamed Road
description: Parking da Freguesía. Quiet moi area to rest and relax. There is a door to the entrance that is always open. You can move on to noite in trouble. Have a nearby road but with little traffic. Have two stone tables and benches. Have a fountain with drinking water.

title: (4970) Sistelo -
description: Place to find magnificent to sleep unexpectedly in this very mountainous area. You can park with 3 vans but in single file by entering a small recess at the edge of the river. Narrow for a motorhome. There is an ecovia hike departure. We can swim. Continue on the road to the left after the religious monument with the picnic tables. It's a dead end. On Google Map this place is indicated ''Praia fluvial de sistelo'', but the road is not mentioned.

title: (32418) Ourense - 75 Lugar Francelos
description: Picnic area with possibility of parking. Next to the river, very quiet to spend the night

title: (36450) Salvaterra de Miño - 10 Rúa Castelao
description: Laundry, it is the cheapest in the area.

title: (36450) Salvaterra de Miño - 23 Bajo, Rúa Castelao
title_short: (36450) Salvaterra de Miño - 23 Bajo, Rúa Castelao
description: Acolada Self-Service Laundry. Easy parking. There is a water fountain right on the next corner.

title: (4950) Cortez - Avenida da Boavista Monção
description: 3 parking spaces in the Continente supermarket car park reserved for AC

title: (4950) Mazedo - Parking Igreja
description:
Huge and empty car park by the church, asphalted and inclined. Beautiful views on the foggy mountains in the morning. Quiet at night, church bells in the morning. Little shade, toilets and water behind the church. 

2km from Monçao, which was too noisy for us on a Friday night.

title: (36450) Salvaterra de Miño - CP-9002
description: Cordeiro river beach. Quite shady place and lots of tables. Very flat and away from main roads, so I don't think it will get too crowded

title: (36450) Salvaterra de Miño - 33 Rúa de Galicia
title_short: (36450) Salvaterra de Miño - 33 Rúa de Galicia
description: Salvatierra de Miño, has a walk along the banks of the Miño River, areas to visit such as its walls, and has free parking for motorhomes

title: (36873) - 37A Lugar Igrexa
description: Nice area to hang out, with a nearby chapel with incredible views that you can climb on foot. It has swings, fountain and garbage containers.

title: (36450) Salvatierra de Miño - Paseo Fluvial
description: Parking at the foot of the river, it is very quiet at night. During the day it is more traveled by having a playground. Perfect to go with bicycles or kayaks, there is a bike path that passes through the parking lot and follows everything along the river side.

title: (36867) - 12 Lugar Searas
description: Eroski car park. Quiet zone.

name: Área de servizo de Caravanas
title: (36450) Área de servizo de Caravanas
description: Quiet area on the banks of the Minho River and close to Canuda Park. Parking is only 2 hours there, and overnight stays are no longer allowed.

title: (36890) Mondariz-Balneario - 14 Avenida Enrique Peinador Vela
description: Small parking lot by the river, with sports equipment, perfect for picnics, overnight stay possible, no service.

title: (36875) Mondariz - 5 PO-252
description: Service area for motorhomes. It has a black and gray water drain, full of clean water and containers. Large parking. Area next to the fluvial beach "Fuente del Val", Mondariz (next to the spa Mondariz). On the river beach you will find a basketball court, a five-a-side football pitch, tennis courts, barbecues and a bar. Village Mondariz and Mondariz Spa within 2 km.

title: (32823) Cartelle - 5 Lugar Sande
description: Quiet and great place to spend the night. It is located next to the Sande soccer field and has a small playground for children. The place is used as a parking lot when there is a football match. The ground is dirt and is quite flat. From here you can do a not very long and beautiful hiking trail. Nearby is the town of Sande where there is a bar.

title: (36860) Ponteareas - 1 Rúa Doctor Fernández Vega
description: Nice large laundry room with parking in front. There are 2 Washers and 4 Dryers. Nearby there are Bars for waiting.

title: (32400) Ribadavia - 17 Lugar Ribadavia
description: Nice place at the mouth of the Avia river. There are a couple of tables with stone benches and good views for a picnic. Quiet and friendly.

title: (32400) Ribadavia - 41 Estrada de Francelos
description: Self-service laundry, A laundry. very economical and clean. Parking in front. Bar / Taperia next door. payment in cash or by card.

title: (32811) Ourense - OU-0214
description: Next to a river, with several stone tables and BBQ venues, there is a fountain with water.. Area with many trees.. Very quiet area

title: (32400) Ribadavia - 15 Rúa José María Martínez Vázquez
title_short: (32400) Ribadavia - 15 Rúa José María Martínez Vázquez
description: Self-service laundry from 8 to 24 h. everyday

title: (32400) Ribadavia - 12 Camiño da Barca
description:
Free, quiet and shady, perfect to discover this beautiful city of Ribadavia. Services available for free.
Quiet, clean, close to old town.
A big thank's  to the local community! 
Rooftop tent, tables or awning is not allowed. Only auto campers!

title: (36873) Pontevedra - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet parking in the malloria of the days of the year, very good views, small unevenness in the malloria of the parking spaces.

title: (36866) Ponteareas - 56 Barranco Freixa
description: Freixa river beach. Very busy in the summer during the day, very quiet at night. In summer there are beach bars during the day and even in recent years lifeguards on the river beach. You can park without problems all year round. Please respect the environment and do not litter, water or camp. A fountain crosses the dam, as well as a recreation area and sports fields. Also a very pleasant riverside path to walk. The town is 2 km away. There is a supermarket just over 1 km away.

title: (36866) Ponteareas - 29 Barranco Freixa
description: Quiet place at night next to the Tea river, 2 km from the city on foot. There is a several kilometer river path, well marked and signposted, with plenty of shade and very pleasant to walk. There are stone tables and public sports fields right next to it.

title: (36895) - 17 Rua Chans
description: Private enclosed level property. Completely gated so pets cannot escape the property.

title: (32824) Cartelle - 96 Lugar Nogueiro
description: Private area in the countryside, with all amenities, including a bathroom and showers for the disabled, barbecue, tennis, basketball, football, horseback riding, exotic bird zoo, playground, cafeteria, a gym. large plots with concrete floor in electric shade

title: (32416) Ribadavia - 35 Rúa do Xestal
description: Parking next to the pool, with tables and barbecues. Swimming possible in the Avia river which passes by.

title: (4970) Viana do Castelo District - 202 EM1286
description: Parking in the ground, along a small road. High quality swimming in the river, access to the Ecovia for hiking. Quiet bar nearby. A few kilometers from the beautiful village of Sistelo. Stunning terraced rural landscape.

title: (36851) Bustelos - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful vantage point, accessible to the top with a small CP or 4x4. Can also spend the night here.

title: (36851) Fornelos de Montes - PO-255
description:
Parking in the middle of this fantastic nature and at the Mirador Chan de Correiro. A beautiful and peaceful spot from where you can start a trail through the mountains. The area is not flat, not tarmacked and just a simple spot. Picknicktables are just 50m away. Quiet through day and night. The road PO255 is curvy and partially not in a superb condition, narrow also and can be crossed by cows, sheeps and goats.
Keep it clean to respect this beautiful nature!

title: (4950) Monção - 63 EM1104
description: Ample parking of the bar "cafe bar da escola" where we are well received with our vehicles and we can spend the night quietly, lovely people, do not charge for parking and cater to the traveler in a pleasant way

title: (4970) - 112-101 N202-2
description: space on the side of the road

title: (4950) Lapela - Rua do Rio Minho
description: Nice place to spend a night or two. Right next to the Minho River and Torre de Lapela. This is a picnic area with tables, restrooms, barbecues and water nearby. Try not to reach the place through the village as the curves are short and could damage your motorhome. There is a road around the village which also leads to this picnic spot! In the village you will find a café and a supermarket.

title: (36470) Salceda de Caselas - 21 Rúa Pontevedra
description: Quiet area with some trees. You can spend the night and the service area is about 400 meters. It is about 50 meters from the center with all the shops around.

title: (32431) Beade - 30 Camino Campo de Souto
description: Nice place to spend the night, flat and grassy area. Perfect as a starting point for walks along the banks of the Avia River or through the vineyards. Swimming area 150 m.

title: (32860) Entrimo - Unnamed Road
description: Water fountain with a tap outlet with a large thread. If you have the appropriate thread ideal for filling water. Negative point the unevenness of the road to fill the tank

title: (32860) Entrimo - Unnamed Road
description: Small parking But with incredible views of the Sierra del Xures.

title: (32431) San Cristovo - 38 Lugar San Cristovo
description: rest area with tables and brazier there is an old soccer field and a court with some baskets and a goal, you have to be careful because it has no net and the ball can go out the place is quiet and surrounded by nature

title: (36470) Salceda de Caselas - PO-510
description: Area for motorhome and van. Open since April 2015 water and emptying. The site is not ideal for sleeping because it is surrounded by roads, but is 5 minutes walk from the center and is the point of the Landres River road that is adjacent to it.

title: (32860) Entrimo - OU-1212
description: Small flat car parking place above village. Nice views of hills. Beside road but not busy

title: (36470) Salceda de Caselas - 4 Rúa Mártires de Sobredo
title_short: (36470) Salceda de Caselas - 4 Rúa Mártires de Sobredo
description: Quiet parking.

title: (32860) Entrimo - OU-1212
description: Just below the official car park, there is another with 5 seats and picnic tables. Farther from the main road, quieter.

title: (4970) Extremo - EM505
description: Incredible panoramic view with picnic tables, barbecue and water (not possible to empty the dirty water on the other hand, nor toilets). Clean (please leave it that way and leave with your waste, including toilet paper). Quiet on a parallel and flat road, top. I don't recommend windy nights though.

title: (32430) Barral - 56 Rúa Alejandro Ferrer
description: Very large parking area. Totally flat. With rubbish bins every hundred meters, on the banks of the Castrelo de Miño, which is a reservoir with more than seven hundred hectares of water. Very quiet, it has areas with grass and others with fine sand. A nice bar aprox 400 meters from the place.

title: (36470) Salceda de Caselas - 26 Rúa Rafael Tilve Adrio
title_short: (36470) Salceda de Caselas - 26 Rúa Rafael Tilve Adrio
description: Self-service laundry with ample dirt parking to park while you do your laundry

title: (32860) Entrimo - 24 OU-1209
description:
Camper Area.
maximum parking 48 hours

title: (32430) Barral - Camiño do Campo
description: Picnic area with barbecue and water tap. It is possible to sleep in a shaded car park. You are 10 meters from the lake, good swimming. The nautical complex is 200 meters away, swimming pool, sports fields, toilets, showers, bars and restaurants.

title: (32860) - Unnamed Road
description: As Perdices recreational area. About 2.5 km from O Casal (Entrimo). River beach and start of different trails. With bins. Very quiet place, you can only hear the flow of water from the river and the song of the little birds.

title: (32815) Castromao - 1 Aldea Castromao
description: Signposted parking of the Roman town of Castromao. on the outskirts of the urban center, with streetlights.

name: Parque de Campismo da Travanca
title: (4970) Parque de Campismo da Travanca
description: Parque de Campismo da Travanca

title: (4970) - Unnamed Road
description: Forest road below the road, quite wide. motorable. attention can not turn around with long vehicle (6m). superb view of the mountains. still provide anti-mosquito / flies.

title: (36721) Os Baños - 74 Rúa Baños
description: Next to the river Miño in Caldelas. In summer there is a chiringuito open and at the end of August there are very popular festivals and it gets full of people. you have to be careful in winter with the rises in the river flow. beautiful views and possibility of routes and bathing

title: (4970) Cabana Maior -
description: Nice point of view my difficult paths

title: (32860) Asperelo e Olín -
description: Next to some erratic boulders with great views. good accessibility by forest road, some ground clearance needed.

title: (36852) Fornelos de Montes - PO-9303
description: Rest area in the middle of nature, it is not paved small slopes, but a place with tranquility where you can wake up surrounded by horses or cows, a route begins from here and about 300 meters some large waterfalls with pools with the possibility of bathing without danger .

title: (32849) Bande - OU-540
description: Small parking spot with water source. Possibility to have picknick.

name: Camping Quinta da Viña Grande
title: (32869) Camping Quinta da Viña Grande
description: Camping at the quinta da Viña Grande. Small, very pleasant campsite with about twenty shaded pitches. A charming welcome. Very clean sanitary facilities with hot water. Pitches Suitable for vans but a little tight for motorhomes.

title: (4970) - Unnamed Road
description: Sleeping between the mountain peaks and cows ... you need a 4x4 to get up.

title: (32800) Celanova - 1 Rua das Lobeiras
description: New parking in the center of town. Totally of land, the lower part leveled. All services such as supermarkets, shops, bars within two minutes

title: (36418) A Arrotea - Unnamed Road
description: Faro Budiño, parking / picnic area that gives access to the climbing school of the same name. Quiet and green place. On weekends something more noisy. Very steep access road in the first section, then smooths out.

title: (4980-020) Lindoso - M530
description: Relatively flat location. Proximity to the road certainly but very little passage in the off season. In the morning horse visit. And a 360 degree view of the splendid valley! Clean place please take care of it.

title: (32415) A Groba - A-52 PK: 249
description: Cepsa service area with free water filling with hose. Lovely staff

title: (36729) Os Baños - 37 Rúa Baños
description: At the end of a small road, we spent a single, hassle-free night near the Mino River.

title: (32800) Celanova - 16B Avenida San Rosendo
description: Large car park cleared below the church, very close to the center; possibility to spend the night. Free parking but no services.

title: (32869) Quintela -
description: Very nice vantage point at the top of the mountain. Directly on the tarred mountain road, but very quiet (March), hardly any cars. There are many cows walking around here and the landscape is surrounded by rocks. You can walk and wander around here very nicely. I think it can be pretty windy up here. The only downside, the place is right near a big power pole.

title: (4970) Soajo - N202
description: Large parking at the start of many hikes

title: (32826) Cartelle - 16 Lugar Lama Grande
description: Center of the village, large parking space next to the church, very quiet, we stayed 1 night without problem.

title: (32816) Vilanova dos Infantes - 8 Rúa de Celanova
title_short: (32816) Vilanova dos Infantes - 8 Rúa de Celanova
description: Torre de Vilanova dos Infantes and fantastic town, worth visiting. Medieval times .

title: () Soajo - N202
description: For nature lovers.Park Information Center in Mézio with museum and pool.

title: (4970-656) Arcos de Valdevez - Unnamed Road
description: Parking not super flat but well exposed. Extra bathing place! From the world in my day calm at night. Water available

title: (36418) O Porriño - Unnamed Road
description: Atios forest park, has enough tables to eat, a large fireplace for grill and parking area. It has water. We spent half a day there and a very quiet place. We would repeat without a doubt, highly recommended.

name: Igrexa de Santa María de Ansemil
title: (32817) Igrexa de Santa María de Ansemil
title_short: (32817) Igrexa de Santa María de Ansemil
description: Parking next to the town church, surrounded by trees which provide shade in several areas. Rural tourism house at the same point. Very quiet and no noise. Surrounded by nature.

title: (32897) Ermille - 55 Lugar Hermille
description: Nice piece of flat terrain just by the lake, narrow entrance from the main road near the gas station surrounded by nature. idilyc place.

name: Parque Autocaravanismo de Soajo
title: (4970) Parque Autocaravanismo de Soajo
description: Small parking lot with gray water drainage, water filling, bike washing station, public toilets and showers (sanitary only open during the day).

title: (32870) Lobios - OU-1207
description: Parking for a camper, access to the lake, no service.

title: (4970) - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful belvedere to spend a night and observe the wildlife.

title: (32870) Aceredo - OU-540
description: Parking, no ban on mobile homes, with a view of the village of Aceredo, which was flooded 30 years ago. We stand here with our camper for one night. Right on the street, quiet at night.

title: (4930) - Unnamed Road
description: St Ovidio viewpoint

title: (36475) - 52 Lugar Vacaria
description: Ample parking at the As Fornas Cultural Center. Super friendly owner, homemade food, spectacular treatment. Not being an area here, man offers you waters. We have spent two super quiet nights, free parking, hiking trails from the parking lot, soccer field, playground, radio controlled car track, highly recommended place.

title: (32870) Aceredo -
description: Currently the once submergwd town of Antiga Aldeia Aceredo is accessible and offers some amazing, albeit morbid views. access is by a somewhat steep dirt road, so 4x4 highly recommended. several places to park, some flat, some with an incline.

title: (4930) Verdoejo - Caminho do Parque das Merendas
title_short: (4930) Verdoejo - Caminho do Parque das Merendas
description: Picnic area with toilets and drinking water. Next to the ecopista and river miño.

title: (36852) Fornelos de Montes - PO-9303
description: Picnic area with parking for two vans before the casariños waterfall ... in the shade ... ideal for eating.

title: (4970-663) Arcos de Valdevez -
description: Stop on the side of the road near the dam. Flat, big view.

title: (32870) Lobios - OU-540
description: View of the lake and parking possible for around twenty motorhomes. Little shade but quiet

title: (32870) Lobios - OU-1202
description: Small picnic area near Lobios. A place in the shade and flat under the walnut trees (avoid parking from mid-September to mid-October: walnut fall) for a vehicle of less than 2.8m and other places. A few tables, barbecue and drinking water. View of the mountain ranges of the Baixa Limia Serra do Xures Natural Park. Provide mosquito repellent. Swimming possible 200m below in the dam lake. Respect for nature and the inhabitants.

title: (32430) Prado de Miño - Unnamed Road
description: This place is perfect to sleep one night. It is the place of a fishing club—as per shown by the 20 fishing docks—but it is  no private road. Tables and permanent BBQ are available and the place is very quiet. The river flows quietly and the trees offer a good shade from the morning sun. The road to get there is a bit narrow, steep and nasty: I would not suggest this place for bigger vehicles. I had no problem with my Viano.

title: (4980-020) Lindoso -
description: Great corner knowing that it is difficult to find a place in the middle of nature in the reserve because the gnr is watching because of the fires. The land is large, flat, we sleep in peace. possibility of fishing and bathing.

title: (32840) Xordos - OU-1201
description: 2 picnic tables and a natural drinking fountain, with a magnificent view of the mountains and the lake... peaceful for a lunch break!

title: (4980-020) Lindoso -
description: Flat place set back from the road that leads to the dam.

title: (32870) Lobios - OU-540
description: Beautiful spot for a van alongside a abandoned road by the water. Follow the asphalt road next to the (amazing) ”Restaurante A Madalena”. No traffic. Very quiet. In the morning one fisherman came by. Caution: the road is wearing off so not recommended for big motorhomes. Perfect for a van. Shop and restaurant nearby.

name: Quinta Santa Marinha Enoturismo & Alojamento
title: (4970) Quinta Santa Marinha Enoturismo & Alojamento
description:
Wine estate, other artisanal and organic products.
If you do not wish to use your own facilities.
You can benefit from Dry Toilets and Ecological showers at your disposal.

By reservation:
Wine tasting: 15€/person. I would offer you a taste of 3 different wines, accompanied by small cold meats or other depending on availability.
Meals: €25/person.
Wine served on site: €10/bottle.
Oenological visit included wine tasting €20.00/person
Gouter–Snack basket for 2 people: €30.00 assortment of cold meats or other depending on availability + 1 bottle of chilled wine.
Breakfast €15.00/person.
Wine to take away €30.00 per box of 6 bottles, possibility of shipping to your address.
Electricity: 15€/24 hours.
The key word tranquility and beauty, always available for our campers.
Very close to Parque Peneda/Geres, Sistelo & Ecovia do rio Vez.
Location reservation preferable 24 hours in advance.
You can visit or do your shopping as many times as you want and keep your location.
Note: Meals are always prepared according to seasonal availability, products from the property or as close as possible, as organic as possible and never products that are out of season or have been around the planet 3 times.

title: (32433) Faramontaos -
description: Parking at a crossroads with little traffic. Right at the starting point for hikes. no service We stood here one night with no problems. The entrance is a bit narrow, but we managed to get through the two stones with a Peugeot Boxer L2H2.

title: (32846) Bande - 16 OU-540
description: Place at the lake, beautiful lake view, very quiet,  the presence of a hot spring arranged to soak, no services

title: (32813) A Pía - Unnamed Road
description: Very nice viewpoint with picnic tables and a relatively flat space for parking. It's a super quiet place on the top of a hill, with the forest underneath. We had a super quiet night here, completely alone, just listening the sound of the owls. Totally recommended for a chill night. Good access for all cars. The place is also very clean, although there aren't any trash bins. Please don't leave trash.

title: (36400) O Porriño - Unnamed Road
description: Two very quiet areas to spend the night both during the day and at night the area below where the large esplanade is at night can be more busy, we stayed in the upper one and all night without noise, a fairly safe place

title: (4980-020) Lindoso - N304-1
description: Park next to the restaurant. Free parking, drinking water, wc. Quiet place.

title: (32870) Lobios - OU-540
description:
A small path along the road which goes down to a nice location where there are 2 picnic tables.

A more than pleasant view of the lake and the small surrounding mountains.

The road is not far but is very lightly used at night. Even with a very light sleep you should not be disturbed.

No trash cans, so please take your trash away.

Little sun, located in the shade of the fir trees.

title: (4980-020) Lindoso - N304-1
description: Huge flat ground. Close to the road but very quiet at night.

title: (4980-020) Lindoso - N304-1
description: Flat spot, shaded with view of the lake. possible to walk to the lake. not the best swim spot of the area tough.

title: (4980-020) - N304-1
description: Wild place at the water's edge accessible only by 4x4. space available for 2 to 3 vehicles.

title: (32870) Lobios - 9 Estrada de Portugal
description: Place to park and sleep, very quiet. There is a city stadium, machines for weight training, tables for eating and green spaces.

title: (4980-453) Lindoso Castelo - N304-1
description: Lindoso village. Parking flat facing the castle for 3/4 camper. Beautiful and calm place.

title: (32846) Bande - 19 OU-540
description: Area for motorhomes and campers, quiet place, protected by UNESCO and Natura 2000, please respect the environment for the good of all. Roman baths 10 minutes walk. Maximum stay 72 hours, it is forbidden to park vans not approved as residential vehicles, it is forbidden to turn on generators from 11:00 p.m. to 9:00 a.m. so as not to disturb the rest of the users of the area (be careful, it is a natural park), respect the environment, do not You can make a campfire or camping under administrative sanction.

title: (32814) A Bola - Estrada de Xinzo
description: Quiet area surrounded by nature, also has a playground, tables and several barbecues that can be used until summer, nearby chiringuito, children's pool, river with shade and quiet to sleep. No dogs allowed.

title: (36400) O Porriño - 2 Rua Paralela 1
description: Service area with showers for a fee. The girl who took care of me was very friendly and helpful.

title: (32848) Bande - OU-540
description: A narrow path leads off the main road. The driveway is a bit overgrown and very uneven but can be driven on without problems for a T4. If you drive a long way along the path, you end up at a reservoir. It is wonderfully quiet and idyllic! We were all alone except for a few pedestrians who were happy to see us. Otherwise, the path looks more like hardly any people are walking by. You can swim in the lake. Right and left you are surrounded by bushes. During the night an animal visited us and sniffed the bus with curiosity.

title: (32846) Bande - 19 OU-540
description: Beautiful place near the river and terms and archaeological site. Shaded tables small bar / catering.

title: (32812) Pegariña - 38 Aldea Pegariña
description: Parking on the mountain basically prepared for large vehicles to turn around since there is no place on the road and for cars that go to the cemetery to park, large and shady, it has a fountain at the entrance of the cemetery

title: (4980-020) Lindoso -
description: Water point with 1 inch thread, good pressure

title: (4980-020) Lindoso - Unnamed Road
description: For tall and / or long motorhomes which cannot access the bivouac on the castle esplanade, it is possible to park along the perimeter wall without obstructing traffic at all. Quiet night. Home of the park nearby.

title: (4970) Sabadim - Unnamed Road
description: Stop for the night finds by chance, tables and old closed facilities. We are lost far from everything and it s beautiful. Garbage cans are no longer collected, remember to clean and keep the place clean

title: (4980-020) - EM530
description: Along a small road in the hollow of the valley with the water below at the foot of the hydroelectric power station for 2 motorhomes, no service, just to spend the night.

title: (32428) Leiro - OU-0306
description: Very quiet place next to the cemetery with picnic tables and a fountain, sun and shade. Climbing area nearby.

title: (36415) - Estrada Porriño Redondela
description: Gas station. Draining gray and black water is free (ideal for refueling)
